title: On your own
brief_description: Explores the wide range of practical subjects covered in the education curriculum for high schools and junior colleges. Some of the many subjects covered include comparative shopping, home ownership vs renting, baking low cost bread, repairing old furniture, credit and money management, family relations, operating a child care centre on campus, and other pertinent studies. Student response is evident in lively group discussions and in scenes filmed in the actual classroom.
